visual_style: POV (first-person perspective) style, filmed as if seen directly through the eyes of the main character. Realistic human interactions, hands and body occasionally visible in frame to reinforce immersion. Natural environments and authentic lighting conditions (daylight, indoor ambient, streetlights at night) captured with head-mounted or handheld cameras. Movements may include natural shakes, tilts, and quick turns, mimicking real vision. Sound design emphasizes proximity and realism, enhancing the immersive feel. Atmosphere gives the viewer the sense of being physically present in the scene. Style reference: immersive GoPro footage, VR first-person films. Aspect ratio 16:9 full frame, no top or bottom borders, no black bars. NOT CGI, NOT animated, NOT cartoon, NOT stylized, NOT 3D, NOT render.
